item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: G.O.A.T. (Greatest Of All Time)

G.O.A.T. is one of New Haven's newest lounges.  They normally aren't open on Mondays, but the owner Steve is nice enough to open up just for us! Let's make sure we have a nice large group :)

G.O.A.T. is a spacious, eclectic lounge (so no food - but lots of free fresh hot popcorn!) wonderfully suited to groups and nightlife. They say that they try to make an evening out inexpensive - and with constantly rotating specials, I think they're definitely committed to that purpose!

Special just for us!:  $5 Martinis

(Their great regular, pre-11pm) Specials:

$1 Miller or Coors Light Drafts

$2 Pabst Blue Ribbon

$3 Well Drinks

https://www.facebook.com/TheGoatCT

For Happy Hour Type Events if you're only a Maybe please clearly state this in your comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: At any Monday, we are usually the largest group at the bar. Please ask the bartender if you do not see us. Or text or call (my # is in my RSVP)
item.name: **OPENING JUST FOR US** New Location G.O.A.T! Nov 12, 2012
